PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE REGULATIONS (BALANCE SHEET VALUE) which replaces the references to "book value" with the term "balance sheet value", to reflect recent changes to accounting standards relating to fair value accounting.
